message.body: Hey, I managed to be at the barn right when it was storming so I didn't ride lucky today, but I did give him a can of stretcher for lunch. Let me know what time on Friday?
Ok, I think leave time is 3pm, just FYI still have to get the ok from the schooling grounds will let u know.
Sounds good, just let me know!
I think I am going to take tonight off. I'm absolutely exhausted. So he could have off today since we rode yesterday, yes??
I'm sure he will be super happy to not have to bend today, haha! I probably won't make it out tomorrow/thurs so ill see you Friday one way or another. Thanks!!
Okeedokee. Yeah, maybe if we don't end up going there we can just go to the hp or something :)
